content: इष् {vI.v} {c6c} <ab>P.</ab> (इच्छति, इयेष, ऐषीत्, एषितुं-एष्टुं, इष्ट) {@--1@} To wish, desire, long for; इच्छामि संवर्धितमाज्ञया ते <ls>Ku. 3. 3</ls>; <ab>oft.</ab> with pot. or imperat. mood; इच्छामि भुंजीत or भुंक्तां भवान्; भुंजीयेतीच्छति <ls>Sk.</ls> {@--2@} To choose; मूत्रेण मौंड्यमिच्छेत् तु क्षत्रियं दंडमेव वा <ls>Ms. 8. 384.</ls> {@--3@} To endeavour to obtain, strive or seek for; भूतिमिच्छता, स्वर्गं &c. {@--4@} To be willing, be about to do anything, mean or intend (with. <ab>inf.</ab>). {@--5@} To ask or expect anything (<ab>acc.</ab>) from any one (<ab>loc.</ab> or <ab>abl.</ab>); देवेषु यज्ञे भागमीषिरे Śat. Br. {@--6@} To acknowledge, regard. {@--7@} To request, ask. {@--8@} To be favourable. {@--9@} To try to make favourable. {@--10@} To assent or consent. {%--<ab>pass.</ab>%} {@--1@} To be wished or liked. {@--2@} To be asked, or requested. {@--3@} To be prescribed or laid down; हस्तच्छेदनमिष्यते <ls>Ms. 8. 322</ls>; त्रिरात्रं दशरात्रं वा शावमाशौचमिष्यते <ls>Y. 3. 18.</ls> {@--4@} To be approved, accepted, or regarded as; जंभो दंतेपि चेष्यते <ls>Trik.</ls> {vII.v} {c4c} <ab>P.</ab> (इष्यति, इयेष, एषिष्यति, एषितुं) {@--1@} To move; to cause to move. {@--2@} To let fly, cast, throw. {@--3@} To raise (as one's voice). {@--4@} To sprinkle. {vIII.v} {c9c} <ab>P.</ab> (इष्णाति) {@--1@} To cause to move quickly, let fly, cast. {@--2@} To fly off, escape. {@--3@} To strike, smite. {@--4@} To impel, urge, incite, animate, promote. {vIV.v} {c1c} <ab>U.</ab> (एषति-ते, ऐषीत्-ऐषिष्ट) To go, move.

इष् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Speedy, going quickly. {@--2@} Wishing, desirous. {%--<ab>f.</ab>%} <ab>Ved.</ab> {@--1@} A draught, refreshment, food. {@--2@} Libation. {@--3@} Strength, power, sap, freshness. {@--4@} Comfort; increase. {@--5@} Affluence. {@--6@} Refreshing waters of the sky. {@--7@} Wish.
